Text: wtf is this crap, stupid .ape file and the sound is so raw; i only wanted a couple songs but, they are all compiled into one huge freakin orgy of piano

you'll need vlc or something to play this, it's in .ape format. the recording is a bit shit tbh - there's a constant hiss on the track (probs because it's such an old recording), but every single face and vertex of the inside and outside of the cd and booklet has been scanned, which is always good
